ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Owner_Name *EQ 'npcpgw' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Local_Port *EQ 1310 *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Protocol *EQ TCP *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ LISTEN *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *LT 1 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Owner_Name *EQ 'npcpgw' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Local_Port *EQ 4581 *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Protocol *EQ TCP *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ LISTEN *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *LT 1 ) )
